analyzed: tam tvā ghṛta sno iti ghṛta sno

original: pra / suṣṭutiḥ stanayantaṃ ruvantam iḷas patiñ jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ /
analyzed: pra suṣṭutiḥ stanayantam ruvantam iḷaḥ patim jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ

original: yo abdimāṃm iyartipra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ // RV_5,42.14 //
analyzed: yaḥ abdimān iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ
sṛjantiḥ rodasī itiḥanuḥ dhanvanāḥ yantiḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ
samrājā yā ghṛta yonī iti ghṛta yonī
mā kasya adbhuta kratū iti adbhuta kratū
